bookingNumber.description: A unique identifier assigned to the shipment booking, used for tracking and reference. They are often referred to as 'Booking Number', 'Booking No.', or 'Booking Reference'.

contractNumber.description: It's a contract number between the carrier and Forto Logistics SE & Co KG. Shipment Id 'S' followed by 6, 7, or 8 digits e.g. S9486358 is not a contract number.

pickUpTerminalCode.description: The specific terminal for cargo pickup during the import shipment.

gateInTerminalCode.description: The specific terminal where cargo is gated in especially Export terminal delivery address. It is mentioned as Delivery Terminal.

proformaDate.description: the date considered to apply the rates and charges specified in the booking confirmation

cfsCutOff.description: the date by which an LCL (Less than Container Load) shipment needs to be checked in to a CFS (Container Freight Station) to meet its scheduled sailing

cyCutOff.description: The date by which the cargo to be delivered to the Container Yard. It can be found with keys Cargo Cut Off.

gateInReference.description: A reference code for cargo entering the terminal to drop the loaded cargo for Export. It can be Turn-in reference or booking Number.

mblNumber.description: Bill of Lading number (B/L NO.), a document issued by the carrier.

pickUpReference.description: A reference code for cargo pickup during the import shipment. Sometimes it can be 'Our Reference'

siCutOff.description: The deadline date for submitting the Shipping Instructions (SI) to the carrier. It can be found with keys Closing Date B/L.

vgmCutOff.description: The deadline date for submitting the Verified Gross Mass (VGM) to the carrier. It can be found with keys Closing Date VGM.

containerType.description: The size / type of the container, such as 20ft, 40ft, 40HC, 20DC etc.

pickUpDepotCode.description: The depot code where the empty container will be picked up. Key to find is 'Pick Up Depot'.

dropOffDepotCode.description: The depot code where the empty container will be dropped off.

eta.description: Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) is the expected date when the shipment will arrive at its destination.

etd.description: Estimated Time of Departure (ETD) is the expected date when the shipment will leave the origin port.

imoNumber.description: The International Maritime Organization number for a specific leg. It can be found as IMO No, IMO number.

serviceCode.description: The Shipping service code associated with the booking confirmation. It is mentioned as SVC-NBR

portOfDischarge.description: The port where the goods are discharged from the vessel. This is the destination port for the shipment. It is referred as Discharge

portOfLoading.description: The port where the goods are loaded onto the vessel. This is the origin port for the shipment. It is referred as Sailing

vesselName.description: The name of the vessel carrying the shipment. It can be found at VESSEL/VOYAGE e,.g. 'MAERSK LINE

voyage.description: The journey or route taken by the vessel for a specific leg. It can be found at VESSEL/VOYAGE e.g. '123W'

carrierAddress.description: The address of the carrier who provides service and issued the document.

carrierName.description: The name of the carrier who issued the document. Extract full name. E.g., Yang Ming Marine Transport Corporation or Yang Ming Shipping EUROPE GmbH
